Considering most of the champions listed above have a shield that scales with their maximum HP they are going to get fat shields when they purchase HP which means Shield Bash is gonna hurt.

I don't think it's unviable lmao, it's just a better scorch.

Alright lets bust out some numbers. Level 2 through first back this rune does a whopping (7+(0.085*60))/3 damage. 4 damage before first back.

Let's jump to level 9 and a full Black Cleaver. Urgot now has 400 bonus health and 2 points and W. We are now at (21+(0.085*(90+0.3*400))+0.015*400)/3. About 15 damage now. For reference Scorch outdamages this rune at this point by 4.4 on the same cooldown.

Now lets say you are level 13 and you are AHEAD so I'll give him 2.5 items. {{item:3071}} {{item:3800}} {{item:3211}} (could be a giant's belt for mallet it really doesn't matter that much for 100 health). We are at 1050 bonus health. So, (29+(0.085*(180+0.3*1050))+0.015*1050)/3. We are now at A MASSIVE 29 damage on the rune. TWENTY NINE. Honestly super game breaking.

Also a thing to note that the damage from the rune is entirely tied to the shield strength at time of your auto attack so if you activate W and get hit for 150 or whatever before you can throw your auto attack, the damage of the rune goes down by a proportional amount. The rune simply isn't good on Urgot it really is that simple.
